biography: S. K. Bagga was an Indian politician and member of the Sixth Legislative Assembly of Delhi. A member of the Aam Aadmi Party, he represented Krishna Nagar of Delhi.
aiSummary: A. K. Bagga is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 64 at Pediatric nephrology (Member). Has been published in The Lancet, Nature Clinical Practice Nephrology, New England Journal of Medicine. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
